languages.text: Рассудительное семейство Гапрак нашло покровителей в рядах служителей Омниссии. Многие его члены получили посмертную почесть становления сервочерепом, а Вицент Гапрак даже вознесся до статуса магоса.

The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.
languages.original_text: Рассудительное семейство Гапрак нашло покровителей в рядах служителей Омниссии. Многие его члены получили посмертную почесть становления сервочерепом, а Вицент Гапрак даже вознесся до статуса магоса.

traits.locale_text: The cold-minded Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many members of the family were granted the posthumous honour of becoming a servo-skull. And Vicent Gaprak in fact ascended to the rank of magos.

The cold-minded Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many members of the family were granted the posthumous honour of becoming a servo-skull. And Vicent Gaprak in fact ascended to the rank of magos.

The calculating Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls. And Vicent Gaprak in fact ascended to the rank of magos.

The calculating Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls. And Vicent Gaprak in fact ascended to the rank of magos.

The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

languages.text: 精明的贾帕克家族在欧姆尼塞亚的仆人中寻得了庇护。许多家族成员被授予了死后成为伺服头骨的荣誉，文森特·贾帕克甚至被擢升到了贤者阶层。
languages.original_text: The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

traits.locale_text: 精于计算的贾帕克家族在欧姆尼塞亚的仆人中寻得了庇护。许多家族成员被授予了死后成为伺服头骨的荣誉，而文森特·贾帕克也擢升到了贤者阶层。

languages.text: Die gerissene Familie Gaprak fand Schutz unter den Dienern des Omnissiah. Vielen der Mitglieder wurde posthum die Ehre zuteil, zu Servoschädeln zu werden, und Vicent Gaprak stieg sogar in den Rang eines Magos auf.
languages.original_text: The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

traits.locale_text: Die berechnende Familie Gaprak fand Schutz unter den Dienern des Omnissiah. Vielen der Mitglieder wurde posthum die Ehre zuteil, zu Servoschädeln zu werden. Und Vicent Gaprak stieg tatsächlich in den Rang eines Magos auf.

languages.text: Les intrigants de la famille Gaprak trouvèrent du soutien auprès des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Beaucoup de ses membres reçurent l'honneur posthume de devenir des servocrânes, et Vicent Gaprak finit même par atteindre le rang de magos.
languages.original_text: The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

traits.locale_text: Les intrigants de la famille Gaprak trouvèrent du soutien auprès des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Beaucoup de ses membres reçurent l'honneur posthume de devenir des servocrânes et Vicent Gaprak finit même par atteindre le rang de magos.

languages.text: La astuta familia Gaprak encontró apoyos entre los sirvientes del Omnissiah. Muchos de sus miembros recibieron el honor póstumo de convertirse en servocráneos, y el propio Vicent Gaprak llegó a ascender al rango de magos.
languages.original_text: The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

traits.locale_text: La calculadora familia Gaprak encontró apoyos entre los sirvientes del Omnissiah. Muchos de sus miembros recibieron el honor póstumo de convertirse en servocráneos, y el propio Vicent Gaprak ascendió al rango de magos.

languages.text: 抜け目のないギャプラック一族は、万機神に仕える者たちの間で庇護を受けていた。そのメンバーの多くは、死後にサーヴォスカルとなる栄誉を与えられた。そしてヴィセント・ギャプラックは、マゴスの地位にまで昇りつめることができた。
languages.original_text: The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

traits.locale_text: 抜け目のないギャプラック一族は、万機神に仕える者たちの間で庇護を受けていた。そのメンバーの多くは、死後にサーヴォスカルとなる栄誉を与えられた。そしてヴィセント・ギャプラックは、マゴスの地位にまで昇りつめることができた。

languages.text: Kurnaz Gaprak ailesi, Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının korumasına girdi. Hane mensuplarından birçoğuna ölümleri sonrası hizmelete dönüşme onuru bahşedilirken Vicent Gaprak, Magos rütbesine kadar yükseldi.
languages.original_text: The shrewd Gaprak family found patronage among the servants of the Omnissiah. Many of its members were granted the posthumous honour of becoming servo-skulls, and Vicent Gaprak even rose to the rank of Magos.

traits.locale_text: Kurnaz Gaprak ailesi, Hermesih hizmetkârları tarafından korumaya alındı. Üyelerinden birçoğuna ölümleri sonrası hizmelete dönüşme onuru bahşedildi ve hatta Vicent Gaprak, Magos rütbesine kadar yükseldi.
